head.title: New Stock Offerings Set for This Week

hedline.hl1: New Stock Offerings Set for This Week

block.p: The following equity and convertible debt offerings are expected this week:
Chello Broadband, the Netherlands, an initial public offering of 26.9 million American depository shares, each representing one ordinary share. Goldman, Sachs & Co. and Morgan Stanley Dean Witter.
CrossWorlds Software, Burlingame, Calif., an initial public offering of four million shares. Chase Bank Hambrecht & Quist.
Exult, Irvine, Calif., an initial public offering of 9 million shares, 7.7 million in the United States and Canada. Merrill Lynch & Co.
First Horizon Pharmaceutical, Roswell, Ga., an initial public offering of 3.8 million shares. Chase Bank Hambrecht & Quist.
Netia Holdings, Warsaw, 2.3 million American depository shares, each representing one share. Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette.
NRG Energy, Minneapolis, an initial public offering of 28.2 million shares. Salomon Smith Barney.
ONI Systems, San Jose, Calif., an initial public offering of eight million shares. Goldman, Sachs & Co.
Siliconware Precision Industries, Taiwan, an initial public offering of 30 million American depository shares, each representing 5 shares. Credit Suisse First Boston and Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette.
Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing, Taiwan, 28.5 million American depository shares, each representing 5 shares. Goldman, Sachs & Co.
UbiquiTel, Bala-Cynwyd, Pa., an initial public offering of 14.5 million shares. Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette.
Urban Cool Network, Dallas, an initial public offering of two million shares. Kashner Davidson Securities. (Source: MCM EquityWatch)
